---
id: get-reset-password-link
title: "Get reset password link"
description: "The API generates a link that allow a user to reset there password. The user must provide a valid key and token, which are used for validating the reset request. Additionally, the user's time zone can be passed  as a parameter to adjust the reset link expiration time."
sidebar_label: "Get reset password link"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get reset password link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/userDetails/reset-password"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API generates a link that allow a user to reset there password. The user must provide a valid key and token, which are used for validating the reset request. Additionally, the user's time zone can be passed  as a parameter to adjust the reset link expiration time.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Query Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"key","in":"query","description":"A unique key used for resetting the password.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"24bad179beac5fb4882d00203d28f2c51adf0763c2"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"token","in":"query","description":"The token used for verifying the password reset request.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"Yrd801pbIhSPPJ0L9JvvESlfdK7xedll"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"zone","in":"query","description":"The time zone in which the password reset link should be valid. e.g: **Asia/Calcutta**","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"Asia/Calcutta"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Header Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"mode","in":"header","description":"Specifies the mode of request. Typically used for interenal requests.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"internal"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>
  <div>
    <ApiTabs
      label={undefined}
      id={undefined}
    >

        value={"201"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          Invalid access token.
          
          
        </div><div>

      </TabItem><TabItem
        label={"400"}
        value={"400"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          Link invalid.
          
          
        </div><div>
          
        </div>
      </TabItem><TabItem
        label={"405"}
        value={"405"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          key is required, Please enter a valid token.
